Banner.Description: I possess a strong understanding and proficiency in both Angular and .NET technologies . With a solid grasp of TypeScript and C#, In Angular my experience extends to building responsive and dynamic user interfaces using Angular Material and Bootstrap, ensuring that the end product is visually appealing and user-friendly. On the .NET side, I adept at writing clean and efficient code, utilizing object-oriented programming principles to create robust and maintainable solutions. Whether it's developing RESTful APIs or WCF, I am able to leverage the power of .NET to deliver high-quality Application.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In a Role as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing clean code unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with .Net, SQL Server or PostgreSQL. With my skills in both TypeScript and C#, I can seamlessly integrate frontend and backend components, ensuring a cohesive and efficient application. I have experience in RESTful API development and can handle data management and integration effortlessly.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Creating platforms with Angular and .Net programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Design layout with SASS, Bootstrap, Tailwind Css, etc.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
